description:
Hayato is working feverishly to clean up the club room, which was ruined when X-Ray Glasses Mk. 33 exploded. Amidst the room`s remains, he finds the Glasses Club albums, and gets drawn in by the nostalgia. Just then, he realizes something...
One day after class, the Glasses Club advisor, Shirogane Hotaka, is called to meet Minabe Yukiya in the health room. What does he find there?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Any Man Who Wears Glasses Cannot Be a Bad Man
Megane o Kakete Iru Otoko ni Warui Otoko wa Inai / Nau Saikyou Frame
メガネをかけている漢に悪い漢はいない / なう最強フレーム
